item.title: Subtitles for body cam videos - Upwork
item.description:
(Need ASAP)
We are looking for a entry level video editor who can assist with subtitling body cam video footage.

The job involves synchronizing subtitles and working exclusively with Adobe Premiere Pro only. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing, particularly with subtitling and syncing audio and video.  It's a simple jobs we will provided the subtitles script for every video, so you only need to transform it into subtitles.
Attention to detail and accuracy is crucial for this project. Strong communication skills and the ability to work independently and meet deadlines are also necessary.
Here's the example of the YouTube video: https://youtube.com/@thehiddenfiles?si=VdXqyYpbczZIFj6A

If you are passionate about video editing and have the necessary skills, we would love to hear from you!

Budget: $70
Posted On: June 28, 2024 07:11 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro

item.title: Seeking Native Speakers for a short Video collection - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for individuals who are fluent in any languages to participate in a short video (30 seconds - 2 minutes) collection project. As part of this project, you will be required to create 10 short videos in your native language. These videos will cover a range of topics and will be used for language learning purposes.

Objective :
The objective of the video collection project is to gather short videos from native speakers in their own languages. These videos help improve AI systems' understanding and generation of human-like speech across different languages and cultures, making interactions more natural and inclusive.


Posted On: June 28, 2024 07:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Acting, Female
Skills: Acting, Female
Country: India

item.title: Facebook Ads Video Editor for a Cosmetics Company - Upwork
item.description:
ONLY APPLY IF YOU ARE AN INDIVIDUAL (WILL NOT PASS THE WORK TO SUBCONTRACTORS) AND AGREE TO AN HOURLY BASIS TYPE OF WORK.

We are seeking a highly skilled and creative video editor to join our team. As an expert video editor for our Facebook ads, you will be responsible for transforming existing video material into captivating social media ads, including FB reels, YouTube shorts, and other relevant platforms. In addition, you will be expected to add basic animations to videos and create small file-size GIFs to enhance their visual appeal.

Responsibilities:

-Edit and enhance existing video material to create compelling social media ads for platforms like FB reels, YouTube shorts, etc.
-Incorporate basic animations to add dynamism and engagement to videos.
-Develop visually appealing and small file size GIFs that align with our brand and marketing objectives.
-Ensure the final output meets quality standards and aligns with the brand guidelines.
-Collaborate closely with the marketing team to understand their requirements and deliver the desired results.
-Work efficiently and deliver projects within the agreed-upon deadlines.
-Stay updated with the latest trends and techniques in video editing, animation, and social media advertising.

Requirements:

-Proven experience as a video editor with a strong portfolio showcasing your skills and creativity.
-Familiarity with creating small file size GIFs for social media platforms and emails.
-Strong understanding of social media trends, ad formats, and platform-specific requirements.
-Exceptional attention to detail and the ability to maintain consistency in branding and messaging.
-Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively within a team.
-Availability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet tight deadlines.
-Previous experience working for a cosmetics company is preferred but not mandatory.
-European-based candidates are preferred due to timezone compatibility.

How to Apply:
If you meet the requirements and are excited about this opportunity, please submit the following with your proposal:

-Links to your previous video editing projects, including social media ads and animations.
-Any specific examples of your work in the cosmetics industry (if applicable).
-Your availability and expected compensation.

We appreciate all applications; however, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview.

Thank you for your interest in joining our team!

Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 07:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Animation, Motion Graphics, Facebook, Graphic Design
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Animation, Motion Graphics, Facebook, Graphic Design
Country: Latvia
click to apply

item.title: Demo Video Builder - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to help us create a captivating demo video for our product. The video will serve as an effective tool to showcase the features and value of our product to potential customers. As a demo video builder, you will be responsible for developing a visually appealing and engaging video that effectively communicates the key benefits and functionalities of our product. The script for the demo video has been written. All that is required is now a production of the video using stock videos, and voice overs for the different parties in the video.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Storyboarding
- Animation
- Scriptwriting
- Voiceover

This is a small project that can be completed within 1 to 3 months. We are seeking an intermediate-level professional who has experience in creating high-quality demo videos. If you have a strong eye for detail, excellent communication skills, and a creative mindset, we would love to work with you! Apply now to join our team and help us bring our product to life.

Hourly Range: $11.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 07:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Animation, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Animation, Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Testimonials video shoot - Grand Junction, CO, USA - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,
We're looking for a videographer for a testimonial shoot in - rand Junction, CO, USA

July 8th, 2024 - 11AM local time
PLEASE READ THE PDF ATTACHED.

1 hour prep
2.5 hours video testimonial shoot + b-rolls on site

We will provide all the information you may need - name, phone number and address.

Please take a close look at the filming guideline attached.

The interviews will have to be live on ZOOM so we can hear and see everything live and able to direct also.

Equipment wise - Camera Sony A7S or better, sound recording equipment, a little bit of lights.

After shooting deliver all the material at the same day via Internet.

We think 1 person is enough for this job, we will talk and coordinate everything, you will do the interview and receive from us the questions you need to ask and what are the key answers that we need for the video.

For the testimonials - 1 Angel of shooting is enough, but shoot it in 4K so we can cut it on editing.

Thank you.

Budget: $700
Posted On: June 28, 2024 06:54 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Photography, Video Production, Cinematography, Testimonial Video
Skills: Videography, Photography, Video Production, Cinematography, Testimonial Video
Country: Israel
click to apply

item.description:
We are seeking a talented Canva shorts/video designer to create eye-catching video templates for shorts, reels, and YouTube. As a designer, you will be responsible for conceptualizing, designing, and implementing templates that align with our brand identity and appeal to our target audience. You must have a strong portfolio showcasing your expertise in creating engaging and visually appealing video templates.
   
   Skills required:
   - Proficiency in Canva and other design software
   - Strong knowledge of video editing techniques
   - Ability to create visually stunning and attention-grabbing designs
   - Understanding of current design trends and best practices for online videos
   
   This is a medium-sized project that requires a creative and detail-oriented designer. The duration of the project will be 1 to 3 months, depending on the complexity of the templates. We are looking for an expert-level designer who can bring innovative ideas and execute them flawlessly. Join our team to make a significant impact on our brand's online presence!

item.title: Masking short video clip to isolate character - Upwork
item.description:
Hi, I have 40 frames of video with a character holding a mirror. I want to isolate his hands/arms/mirror, take away his head, and remove any colors/shadows from the background. It can keep the natural (off-white/cream) color as long as it’s smooth. Delivered as PNGs.

I want to have it delivered in about 5-10 days max.

I can share the clip but the clip I rendered is a continuous clip of 200 frames or so. I’m travelling so I can’t change that today. I would send you individual frames, 40 in total. If you see this clip, it would be like every 7th frame for the first 20, then 20 continuous frames.

Let me know your price and when you can deliver please.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1m9sEw_f0ecnkuljrrYBbOt_buV4jKI65/view?usp=drivesdk

Thank you!
Gary


Posted On: June 28, 2024 06:42 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Post-Editing, Resolve, Nuke
Skills: Video Post-Editing, Resolve, Nuke
Country: Germany
click to apply

As a UGC Creator, you will be responsible for creating high-quality user-generated content that highlights the features of this app. This includes creating engaging video & editing that resonates with our target audience.

   Responsibilities:
   - Create compelling UGC that aligns with the objectives of the app
   - Do the final edits & post processing of the video
   - Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and techniques in UGC creation

   Requirements:
   - Proven experience as a UGC Creator
  - Knowledge of hooks
   - Proficiency in video editing software
   - Excellent storytelling and communication skills
   - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

item.title: Adobe Premiere Pro Expert Needed to Teach Video Editing for Cooking Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Adobe Premiere Pro Expert Needed to Teach Video Editing for Cooking Videos

Hello!

I am looking for an experienced Adobe Premiere Pro expert to teach me how to edit cooking videos. My goal is to create high-quality, engaging content for my online cooking course and social media platforms. If you have a passion for video editing and have teaching experience please apply.

Responsibilities:

Provide one-on-one tutoring sessions on Adobe Premiere Pro with a focus on editing cooking videos.
Teach essential editing techniques including cutting, transitions, color correction, and audio editing.
Share tips and tricks specific to cooking videos, such as managing multiple camera angles, adding text overlays for recipes, and creating engaging intros and outros.
Help set up and organize project files for efficient workflow.


Requirements:
Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro with proven experience in video editing.
Ability to communicate complex concepts in a simple, understandable manner.
Patience and excellent teaching skills.
Availability for regular tutoring sessions via Zoom or another online platform.

Preferred Qualifications:

Knowledge of other Adobe Creative Cloud applications (e.g., After Effects, Photoshop) is a plus.
Experience with video production and shooting techniques.

To Apply:
Please submit the following:

A brief introduction about yourself and your experience with Adobe Premiere Pro.
Examples of cooking videos or similar content you have edited.
Examples of your teaching.
Your availability and preferred schedule for tutoring sessions.
Your hourly rate.
I look forward to learning from you and creating amazing cooking videos together!

Best regards,
Rebecca

Hourly Range: $30.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 06:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply
